name: SpaceHopper - MobGameDev Final
description: Space Hopper is the name for my Final Project in my Mobile Game Design Class. I had alot of fun creating the different levels for the game and learning the different methods of approach for making mobile games. As someone who leans more towards the FPS/PC genre, this was entirely new for me. But in the end, I'm happy to have been able to learn about this field of gaming.
